item.title: Public Speaking
item.description:
Public Speaking: Is it really hard or do you make it harder yourself?

Points to be noted while public speaking

  1. Make a nice and clear pace. Don’t go too fast or too slow.
  2. Take time for audience to make them comprehend your point nice and clear to go.
  3. Make a certain dramatic pose when you assert a strong point so that people can clearly understand and appreciate your point.
  4. Don’t think too harsh on the subject matter so that you get confused while speaking.
  5. Hand gestures is about balance or something like that. Certain gestures don’t look so good. Don’t be a frozen speaker.
  6. Working together to make your voice understand to the people. Large audience 45 degree, 135 degree, 90 degree.
  7. Facial expressions can depict powerful messages so make sure that it matches the way you and the content of your speech.
  8. Movement is best when transitioning from one point to another point. Don’t move and move back and forth.
  9. Intentional body movements and facial gestures can clarify the topic more than any words do.
  10. Appearance matters since sloppy people can’t attract people to listen to them.
  11. Word Choice: umm and filler words are to be transformed into the pause.
  12. Colorful words: This person is travelling down the road of mediocre life: the words that evokes emotions.
